arts.ttl: Tottenham Hotspur XI vs Bodø/Glimt – Predicted lineup and team news
arts.sum: Tottenham Hotspur travel to Norway on Tuesday for a crucial Champions League fixture against Bodø/Glimt, aiming to make it two wins from two in the new league phase. After a frustrating 1-1 draw with Wolves at the weekend, a convincing performance is needed to get their season back on track and build momentum. arts.ttl: Bodø/Glimt vs Tottenham Hotspur – Match Preview and Team News
arts.sum: Tottenham Hotspur travel to the Arctic Circle on Tuesday for their second Champions League fixture, facing familiar foes Bodø/Glimt at the Aspmyra Stadium. The match is the Norwegian champions’ historic first-ever Champions League home game.
